dct_alternative_sm: Budapest, Hungary Budapest Map and Guide
dct_description_sm: Published by the Municipal Information Office.
Indexes for cultural centers, transportations hubs, hotels, restaurants, and other points of interest on margin.
Some notes in German, Italian, and French.
Verso: tourist guide with tours and recommendations.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
